'''Moka''' may refer to:
;Places *[[Moka]], Mauritius, capital of the Moka District *[[Moka, Equatorial Guinea]] *[[Moka, Hiiu County]], a village in Hiiu County, Estonia *[[Moka, Rapla County]], a village in Rapla County, Estonia *[[Moca, Puerto Rico]] *[[MÅka, Tochigiâ]], Japan
;Other *[[Moka Akashiya]], a character from the anime/manga ''Rosario + Vampire'' *[[Moka exchange]], a gifting ritual that establishes social status among the Kawelka of Papua New Guinea *[[Moka pot]], a type of coffee pot *[[MokaFive]], a software company *MOKA, a 3D geometrical modeler based on a topological kernel *The Moka Bar, the first espresso bar in the Soho district of London, features in "[[The Electronic Revolution]]", an essay by William S. Burroughs
